### How To Run (for Unix)

# first run the following command to install any required packages you might be missing
$ pip3 install -r requirements.txt

# now you can visualize the data. run
$ python3 airtable-activity-graph.py

# the generated files will automatically be saved in this directory.
# in case you don't like the scaling, change the window size of the plot when it pops
# up after running the script and when you're happy, save it manually in your preferred location
